suncertify.gui.util
Class GUIUtil

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.gui.util.GUIUtil

public final class GUIUtil
extends Object

GUIUtil is an utility class providing useful and common features for GUI components, dialogs, windows and widgets.

Author:
Przemyslaw Bielicki

Method Detail

actionChangeDBFile

public static String actionChangeDBFile(Window owner,
                                        String oldValue)
Action invoked when user clicks Change option in order to change db filename (either local or server side).

Parameters:
owner - Frame - owner window (needed to display message dialog).
oldValue - String - current filename - returned in case of failure or selecting Cancel by the user in the selection dialog.
Returns:
String - selected by the user new filename or the old one if the new one was not selected or any failre occurs.

actionExit

public static boolean actionExit(Frame owner)
Action invoked when user clicks Exit option (either button or any other widget) in order to exit the application.

Parameters:
owner - Frame - owner window (needed to display message dialog) that is to be exited from.

getCenterLocation

public static Point getCenterLocation(Window owner,
                                      Dimension size)
Returns center position as Point for the given owner Window and size of the component to be centered. If the owner window is null this method returns the center position relatively to the screen (depending on currently set resolution).

Parameters:
owner - Window - owner window (needed to display message dialog) relating to which the center position will be calculated.
size - Dimension - size of the component to be centered.
Returns:
Point - center position for the given owner window (needed to display message dialog) and size of the component to be centered.

getConfigurationMenu

public static JMenu getConfigurationMenu(Frame owner)
Initializes the common Configuration menu with all available configuration options (these options are stored in the command.properties config file).

Parameters:
owner - Frame - owner window (needed to display message dialog).
Returns:
JMenu - the common Configuration menu with all available configuration options.

getFileMenu

public static JMenu getFileMenu(Frame owner)
Initializes the common File menu with all available options.

Parameters:
owner - Frame - owner window (needed to display message dialog).
Returns:
JMenu - the common File menu with all available options.

getHelpMenu

public static JMenu getHelpMenu(Frame owner)
Initializes the common Help menu with all available options.

Parameters:
owner - Frame - owner window (needed to display message dialog).
Returns:
JMenu - the common Help menu with all available options.

setIntField

public static void setIntField(JTextComponent textField)
Sets given text field in a way that it only accepts digits.

Parameters:
textField - JTextComponent - text component to be set as an integer field.

setTextLimit

public static void setTextLimit(JTextComponent textField,
                                int size)
Sets the text limit for the given size for given text component.

Parameters:
textField - JTextComponent - component to which text limit is to be set to.
size - int - text limit.
